column5: Can someone tell me the slot size for walleye on Balsam lake please. I cant seem to find it. Is the limit 2 as well ?  Thanks
no fish between 14.6 and 21.7 inches and 3 fish limit

Here's the link Brian - http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/stdprodconsume/groups/lr/@mnr/@letsfish/documents/document/mnr_e001336.pdf, look at first entry under "Exceptions to Zone 17 Regulation"  Sportfishing Licence - limit 3, Conservation Licence - limit 1, no fish between 37 and 55cm (14.6-21.7inches).  Good luck!!  Happy eating!!
heck he could have looked it up, guess he's saving his energy for all the fish he wants to catch
Thanks guys.  Printed off the three pages SO. Good info for other lakes.   Hey,Im a busy guy. OFC came through.
